summary: This mod adds a new companion Tralok Battle Axe.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Tralok - young orc of long Mahulak's house,
tired of life in which the fortress and it is ready to join you
in your arduous adventures.
Weapons:
Tralok have an axe and ebony shield for which he adapted skull Aldmer and skulls of deer, their he got in one of the raids on the small estate on the outskirts, where the family lived a former Justiciar Aldmer dominion, by order of which the whole castle orcs were destroyed along with the womens and childrens.

Armor:
Tralok's armor made in gladiatorial style, it does not hinder the movements, and steel and iron plates reliably protect parts of the body.

Appearance:
Tralok, despite his youth, has already been in many battles,
while defending the fortress. After each battle, he was doing a tattoo,
they are proof of his courage, inspire fear and due respect for the enemy, and his bright red, burning eyes - this is the last thing the enemy sees in his life. In height he more of their relatives, which makes it even more formidable opponent.
Location:
Location Narzulbur (long house Mahulak)
location is about Windhelm.

Rest:
-I Have Tralok perks to axes, shields and one-handed weapons
-Gathering Levels with you.
Do not kill enemies with one or two blows
Â 
Setting:
Copy the files from the archive in the fashion Skyrim / data, connect esp. in the launcher

Removal:
Delete files from the mod Skyrim / data
I hope you enjoy it
author: Drow33
